section.title: fuzzer_initialize.h
section.programlisting: 00001 //==-- fuzzer_initialize.h - Fuzz Clang ------------------------------------==// 00002 // 00003 // Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. 00004 // See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information. 00005 // SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception 00006 // 00007 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00008 // 00009 // Defines a function that returns the command line arguments for a specific 00010 // call to the fuzz target. 00011 // 00012 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===// 00013 00014 #include <vector> 00015 00016 namespace clang_fuzzer { 00017 const std::vector<const char *>& GetCLArgs(); 00018 }
